it.polimi.se2019.server.controller

Class AbstractDeathController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.controller.Controller
      • it.polimi.se2019.server.controller.AbstractDeathController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher, Observer<VCEvent>, VCEventDispatcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeathController

    public abstract class AbstractDeathController
extends Controller
    This class implements some useful methods used when calculating points.

      • update

        public void update(VCEvent message)
        This method ignores the events that are not dispatched in this controller.
        Parameters:
        message - Any message arriving from the view.

      • assignPoints

        protected void assignPoints(Map<FigureColour,Integer> figuresToHits,
                            String user,
                            List<Tear> hp)
        This method assigns the points to the users when a player dies or when the match ends.
        Parameters:
        figuresToHits - a map between the figure colour and the number of hits they gave to the dead user.
        user - the user that died.
        hp - the hps of the dead user.

      • calculateHits

        protected Map<FigureColour,Integer> calculateHits(List<Tear> hp)
        Calculates the hits each player gave to the player that died.
        Parameters:
        hp - the hps of the dead pplayer.
        Returns:
        the map between the colour of the shooter and the number of hits they caused.

      • firstBlood

        protected void firstBlood(Tear firstShooter)
        Gives one extra point to the user that shot first.
        Parameters:
        firstShooter - the user that shot first.

      • calculateOverkills

        protected void calculateOverkills(List<Skull> killshotTrack)
        Calculates the overkills caused during a match.
        Parameters:
        killshotTrack - the kills that took place during the match.

      • winnerPointCalculation

        protected void winnerPointCalculation(List<Skull> killshotTrack)
        calculates points at the end of the match.
        Parameters:
        killshotTrack - the kills that took place during the match.

      • endOfMatch

        public void endOfMatch()
        Implements the end of he match calculating points and notifying all users.
